dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement on your Planet.com server
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 09, 2005 1:02 PM
To: jonlaw@buyabeat.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement on your Planet.com server

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Jonathan Lawrence <jonlaw@buyabeat.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Wednesday, February 9, 2005, 12:31:35 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement on your Planet.com server

===8<==============Original message text===============
Hi,

There is a domain on your network that is being used for posting uploaded
pirated software:  www.hhkingz.com

Please research this domain with your abuse department.  A search for the
domain name in any search engine even pulls up piracy-related information.
Ultimately, we had recently reported to another hosting company
(layeredtech.com) that our own companies' products were being illegally
distributed on this domain owner's other site, www.realestniggas.com, which
was successfully removed today (the entire site was geared towards
deliverying illegal downloads).  However, the www.hhkingz.com domain still
exists and is being used intermittently for posting our companies' products
among others (including mp3's and other pirated software/media).  See below
for the whois info:

Domain name: HHKINGZ.COM

Registrant Contact:
   [None]
   Realest Niggas (Porky2k4@Hotmail.com)
   +1.2818290161
   Fax: none
   21311 Branford Hils Lane
   Katy, TX 77450
   US

Administrative Contact:
   [None]
   Realest Niggas (Porky2k4@Hotmail.com)
   +1.2818290161
   Fax: none
   21311 Branford Hils Lane
   Katy, TX 77450
   US

Technical Contact:
   [None]
   Realest Niggas (Porky2k4@Hotmail.com)
   +1.2818290161
   Fax: none
   21311 Branford Hils Lane
   Katy, TX 77450
   US

Billing Contact:
   [None]
   Realest Niggas (Porky2k4@Hotmail.com)
   +1.2818290161
   Fax: none
   21311 Branford Hils Lane
   Katy, TX 77450
   US

Status: Locked

Name Servers:
   ns1.eniki.net
   ns2.eniki.net


   Name Server[whois+dns with ip] NS1.ENIKI.NET 69.93.205.163
   Name Server[whois+dns with ip] NS2.ENIKI.NET 69.93.205.164


Currently, the hhkings domain does not appear to have anything uploaded to
it's viewable parent directory at www.hhkingz.com, but seeing that it is
still used frequently as a referral URL for obtaining illegal material, it
must be disconnected.  We are trying to prevent the domain owner from
continuing to post copyrighted material as well as being allowed to breach
Federal law, our terms and conditions, and your own hosting company's
policy.  Can you see to it that past records of upload logs are analyzed for
pirated material?

Please let us know what is being done about the domain.  In the meantime, we
will be monitoring the domain for any more uploads.

- --------------------------------------
Kindest Personal Regards,
Jonathan Lawrence
Modern Beats, Inc.

ModernBeats.com
MPCsounds.com
BuyaBeat.com

512-255-5999

===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCCl4XvK/XpJs6oyURAn7ZAKCH0FF19o6FuvGtJiv2G492sM/wfACfTWsW
e2wkDpaiuFgJKbu7hbsjL/w=
=+jPV
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
